title: Project Maven
description:
Land of the Giants host Shirin Ghaffary and co-host Alex Kantrowitz explain how a secret contract with the US Department of Defense prompted a showdown between Google and its engineers.
This is a preview of Land of the Giants Season 3, Episode 5: A Military Contract Tests Google’s Open Culture. Check out the full episode here.

itunes:title: Project Maven
itunes:author: Recode
itunes:subtitle: Google's Project Maven was the opening shot in a battle between employees and management over the future of the company.
